title: Usain Bolt's heir apparent? Meet Armand 'Mondo' Duplantis, the new star of track and field

title: Pregnant actresses: 'We're not treated like people'
description: The way some actresses are treated is straight out of "the dark ages", says the Equality Commission.

title: Moeen 'finally feels back' and is targeting summer Test return

description: The Love Light festival projects images on to historic city buildings and dogs in illuminated costumes.

title: Military tanks form heart shape for Russian soldier's proposal

title: Australia weather: How much rain did it take to put out NSW fires?

title: 'Why we chose a civil partnership over marriage'

description: Stephanie Simpson is thought to have died in a "tragic accident" while hiking in a national park.

title: Harry Miller: Police probe into 'transphobic' tweets unlawful

title: Ex-prisoner on protective instinct during London Bridge attack
description: In 2019, ex-prisoner Gareth Evans protected others from London Bridge attacker Usman Khan.

title: Antarctic island hits record temperature of 20.75C
description: The temperature was recorded on an island off the Antarctic continent's northern tip.

title: 'I'm not afraid, I am determined, confident' - Pele plays down son's health comments
description: Legendary Brazil forward Pele speaks for the first time since his son claimed he was reluctant to leave his house, saying his health problems are "normal for people of my age".

title: Consumer contract changes 'could save customers money'
description: Internet, pay-TV and phone customers will now be offered the best deals when their contracts end.
